participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Caring and hardworking, Jake is dedicated to his craft and loves his pets.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. i am a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5 cats. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.name: Mia
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and adventurous, Mia is eager to experience life outside her parents' home.
participant_2.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i don't drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i work part time at burger king.
